title: Retaliation
description: Frankie Stevens, a girl who had it all, the glitz, the glam and the looks. She never needed for anything, her brothers made sure she was taken care of in all aspects of her life. Ace Hudson, a man who fell hard for Frankie. He did not take it too lightly when he figured out he had been played by her and she no longer wanted him. Ace's obsession takes on a new light and he vowed that Frankie and her brothers would pay. She would be his one way or another even if it meant ruining both their lives.  Warning: This book is recommended for readers 18 years and over. It contains sex and submission and violence.
author: E.L. Beth
